response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above $800,000. However, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure a seamless integration into your existing systems or processes.
